title: Ticket #4859: Hibernation not working Windows 7
description: We have reports that HTCondor-initiated hibernation isn't working on Windows 7.
remarks:
2015-Feb-06 11:27:16 by johnkn:
Ivan did a test, and Hibernation is working fine on Windows 7. I think this is just operator error. More Info WhyWindowsHibernationFails
